languages.text: "Пусть мои особые слуги из запретных цехов изучат механизм и приспособят его как замену астропатическому хору".
"Have my special servants from the forbidden workshops study the mechanism and make use of it as a replacement for the world's Astropathic Choir."
languages.original_text: "Пусть мои особые слуги из запретных цехов изучат механизм и приспособят его как замену астропатическому хору".

traits.locale_text: "Have my special servants from the forbidden guilds research the mechanism and make use of it as a replacement for the astropathic choir."
"Have my special servants from the forbidden guilds research the mechanism and make use of it as a replacement for the astropathic choir."
"Have my special servants from the forbidden workshops study the mechanism and make use of it as a replacement for the world's Astropathic Choir."

languages.text: “让禁忌车间里的专业仆人研究这台装置，想办法用它代替这个世界的星语唱诗班。”
languages.original_text: "Have my special servants from the forbidden workshops study the mechanism and make use of it as a replacement for the world's Astropathic Choir."

traits.locale_text: “让禁忌车间里的专业仆人研究这台装置，想办法用它代替这个世界的星语唱诗班。”
“让禁忌车间里的专业仆人研究这台装置，想办法用它替代星语唱诗班。”

languages.text: «Que mis sirvientes especiales de los talleres prohibidos estudien el mecanismo y lo utilicen como sustituto del Coro de Astrópatas del mundo».
languages.original_text: "Have my special servants from the forbidden workshops study the mechanism and make use of it as a replacement for the world's Astropathic Choir."

traits.locale_text: «Que mis sirvientes especiales de los talleres prohibidos estudien el mecanismo y lo utilicen como sustituto del Coro de Astrópatas del mundo».

languages.text: 「禁じられた工房の専門従者にこのメカニズムを研究させ、感応通信聖歌隊の代わりとして活用させるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Have my special servants from the forbidden workshops study the mechanism and make use of it as a replacement for the world's Astropathic Choir."

traits.locale_text: 「禁じられた工房の専門従者にこのメカニズムを研究させ、感応通信聖歌隊の代わりとして活用させるのだ」
「禁じられた工房の専門従者にこのメカニズムを研究させ、感応通信聖歌隊の代わりとして活用させるのだ」

languages.text: « Ordonnez à mes serviteurs spécialisés des ateliers interdits d'étudier le mécanisme et de l'employer en remplacement du chœur astropathique de la planète. »
languages.original_text: "Have my special servants from the forbidden workshops study the mechanism and make use of it as a replacement for the world's Astropathic Choir."

traits.locale_text: « Ordonnez à mes serviteurs spécialisés des ateliers interdits d'étudier le mécanisme et de l'employer en remplacement du chœur astropathique de la planète. »

languages.text: "Meine speziellen Diener aus den verbotenen Werkstätten sollen den Mechanismus studieren und anstelle des astropathischen Chors benutzen."
languages.original_text: "Have my special servants from the forbidden workshops study the mechanism and make use of it as a replacement for the world's Astropathic Choir."

traits.locale_text: "Meine speziellen Diener aus den verbotenen Werkstätten sollen den Mechanismus studieren und anstelle des astropathischen Chors benutzen."
"Die spezialisierten Diener aus den verbotenen Werkstätten sollen den Mechanismus erforschen und ihn als Ersatz für den astropathischen Chor einsetzen."

languages.text: "Yasaklı atölyelerdeki özel hizmetkârlarım, mekanizmayı inceleyip dünyadaki Astropatik Koro'nun yerine kullanılmasını sağlasın."
languages.original_text: "Have my special servants from the forbidden workshops study the mechanism and make use of it as a replacement for the world's Astropathic Choir."

traits.locale_text: "Yasaklı atölyelerdeki özel hizmetkârlarım, mekanizmayı inceleyip dünyadaki Astropatik Koro'nun yerine kullanılmasını sağlasın."
